content.raw:
My bad, there is a scale in the transformation matrix in the DAE files:

<matrix sid="matrix">0.010000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.010000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.010000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000</matrix>

The importer we're using didn't handle that correctly. I've fixed that, so the scales are correct. I still have the weird offsets, looking into that. If necessary, I'll make a new bugreport.
